channel.title: Blog Posts on Autism-101 provides resources for newly diagnosed Autistic people and those who think they might be.
channel.description: Recent content in Blog Posts on Autism-101 provides resources for newly diagnosed Autistic people and those who think they might be.

item.title: Autism and Routines
item.description: There are many routines that I find myself doing. From wearing the same grey shirt every day to eating the same food.

item.title: Hyperfocus
item.description: One Autistic trait that I have is the ability to hyperfocus on something that I am really interested in.

item.title: In Sync
item.description: I got my Autistic diagnosis late last year as an older adult.
